mapper.select: SELECT bus_schedule_id, sour_id, dist_id, num, price, date, time, distance, lasting, type FROM t_bus_schedule
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bus_schedule (sour_id, dist_id, num, price, date, time, distance, lasting, type) VALUES (#{sourId}, #{distId}, #{num}, #{price}, #{date}, #{time}, #{distance}, #{lasting}, #{type})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bus_schedule SET sour_id = #{sourId}, dist_id = #{distId}, num = #{num}, price = #{price}, date = #{date}, time = #{time}, distance = #{distance}, lasting = #{lasting}, type = #{type} WHERE bus_schedule_id = #{busScheduleId}
